name: AURecordedParameterEvent
desc: An event recording the changing of a parameter at a particular host time.

items.name: init(hostTime: UInt64, address: AUParameterAddress, value: AUValue)
var address: AUParameterAddress
items.desc: The address of the parameter whose value changed.

items.name: var hostTime: UInt64
items.desc: The host time at which the event occurred.

items.name: var value: AUValue
items.desc: The value of the parameter at the given time.
